interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: KISSIO Lipstick Set,4Pcs Cigarette Matte Lipstick Set,Red Matte Pigmentation Lipstick,Long Lasting Waterproof Lipstick for women
Review Date: 2020/12/13
Store: KISSIO
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Brand': 'KISSIO', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Stick', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Product Benefits': 'Long Lasting,Cleansing,Moisturizing,Long-lasting,Makeup', 'Package Dimensions': '10.79 x 8.27 x 0.47 inches; 2.01 Ounces'}
Review Text: These are fine. They don't stay very well though, and they make my lips a bit dry, so I still end up adding a lip balm over top, and that sort of ruins the matte finish. The color is good. I like the size of the container as well, like a lip balm.
Review Title: Nice Colors
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
AuroTrends Makeup Remover Towel,2 Pack Reusable Chemical-free Microfiber Makeup Remover Cloths,Magically and Gently Wipe Away Cosmetics,Sunscreen,Oil and Dirt,Set of 2 (Pink+Black) AuroTrends {'Brand': 'AuroTrends', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Material Feature': 'Reusable', 'Unit Count': '2.0 Count', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.52 x 2.72 x 1.42 inches; 6.4 Ounces'} These are really soft. Also, even when they are soaking wet, they don't feel drippy. I am weird about having water on/in my face, and these cloths allow me to wash my face without triggering an odd anxious feeling. I really like these cloths and always keep one on hand. Really Soft TELETIES - Spiral Hair Coils - Ponytail Holder Hair Ties for Women - Phone Cord Hair Ties - Strong Grip, No Rip, Water Resistant, No Crease Hair Tie Coils - 3 pack (Large, Maliblu) Teleties {'Material': 'Fabric', 'Item Form': 'Spiral', 'Brand': 'Teleties', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Number of Pieces': '3', 'Package Dimensions': '3 x 3 x 1.2 inches; 2.08 Ounces', 'UPC': '711841892807'} I love telephone cord style hair ties. They gather all of my hair into a ponytail or bun easily and, best of all, they don't give me headaches like more traditional hair elastics. These are a pretty combination of aqua blue and white, and they are very sturdy. No Headaches RAREKIND Fade Matte Lipstick by Amorepacific - 10 Colors, Cruelty-Free Nourishing Lip Stick, Velvety-smooth, Long-Lasting Moisturizing Lipstick - 3.2g Maple Road RAREKIND {'Package Dimensions': '3.3 x 0.9 x 0.9 inches; 0.95 Ounces'} Eh. The color is bit more orange-y than I’d hoped for by the photo. It’s really thick. It doesn’t stay put or feel great on. I might try mixing it with some gloss if I liked the color more. Not thrilled Reusable Cotton Swab Portable Silicone Swab Washable Cotton Swabs for Ear Cleaning Beauty Treatment Makeup Cotton Swab JAOYU {'Product Dimensions': '3.2 x 3.2 x 0.39 inches', 'UPC': '739232135913'} I was skeptical. I am autistic, and I hate the feel of water in my ears, so I use cotton swabs to dry my ears after a shower. This adds up to a lot of swabs and I felt guilty about putting that many into the trash when I could make a tiny difference environmentally. I didn't really think the silicone option would work. The cotton soaks up the water. But the little knobby end actually does pull the water out of my ear canal.

The case is fine. I feel like the rubber bit that holds it together will eventually break. It is just flimsy. But, for now, it does its job. I ordered the blue, and it is a pretty dull blue, but the swab works, so whatever. It Works KISSIO Lipstick Set,4Pcs Cigarette Matte Lipstick Set,Red Matte Pigmentation Lipstick,Long Lasting Waterproof Lipstick for women KISSIO {'Brand': 'KISSIO', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Stick', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Product Benefits': 'Long Lasting,Cleansing,Moisturizing,Long-lasting,Makeup', 'Package Dimensions': '10.79 x 8.27 x 0.47 inches; 2.01 Ounces'} These are fine. They don't stay very well though, and they make my lips a bit dry, so I still end up adding a lip balm over top, and that sort of ruins the matte finish. The color is good. I like the size of the container as well, like a lip balm. Nice Colors
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** Continues to value reusable, eco-friendly skincare and hair accessory solutions, while also exploring cosmetic options with a focus on color accuracy and texture. The recent purchase reflects an ongoing commitment to innovative, sustainable products but highlights a discerning eye for quality and effectiveness.

- **Material Preference:** Prefers soft, high-quality materials for comfort, particularly in fabric-based items. Recent interactions indicate a strong appreciation for innovative materials, but concerns about durability persist, especially in cosmetics.

- **Skin Sensitivity:** Demonstrates sensitivity to water and specific discomfort in ear care, prompting a preference for products that enhance comfort and mitigate anxiety. Mixed experiences with cosmetics signal a need for careful evaluation of product performance to ensure suitability.

- **Functionality:** Prioritizes practicality and effectiveness in all routines. Recent experiences suggest a growing acknowledgment of the importance of performance in cosmetic products while maintaining a critical stance on longevity and overall satisfaction.

- **Consistency in Purchasing:** Maintains a consistent behavior of seeking reusable products that align with comfort and practicality. The latest cosmetic experience indicates an evolving standard that seeks both aesthetic appeal and functional reliability.

- **Overall Satisfaction:** Likely to rate products based on alignment with personal comfort and practical needs. The user remains critical and discerning about quality, especially in cosmetics, reflecting a commitment to enhancing their beauty routine with reliable and effective solutions.

Overall, the user remains focused on comfort, functionality, and environmental responsibility, while continuously evaluating product efficacy and durability across various categories.
